<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"><info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated></info><macro name="title">
    <text quotes="true" suffix="," variable="title" /></macro><citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="Ignore me" />
    </layout></citation><bibliography>
    <layout>
      <text macro="title" />
    </layout></bibliography></style>
